posts.title: My first note
posts.content: This is my first note. I'm so happy to be here!
posts.author: John Doe

posts.title: My second note
posts.content: This is my second note. I'm still kinda happy to be here.
posts.author: John Doe

posts.title: My third note
posts.content: This is my third note. Happiness no longer abounds.
posts.author: John Doe
